column4: i've seen synaptic.. it's nicely done!
but the thing with synaptic (and other gui's) is that i don't know how to do it from console
tiglion: thanks for the tip.. but i will try to use the command way as often as my lazyness allows me ;-)
I don't have a grub.conf file
I'm using grub, not lilo. there's no mention of scsi in /boot/grub/menu.lst
thoreauputic: ah, ok.. where in menu.lst do I need to add it? and is it hdd or hdc?
I've raised a bug report for the k3b problem, but the bug isn't getting any attention. Would you have any suggestions for what I could do next please?
it seems to be related to the kernel version used
I'll have to write it on MS XP i guess
never trust an OS you don't have the sources for ;-)
